column7: Instruction in violin at the advanced undergraduate and graduate level. Music majors must register concurrently in an approved ensemble. Additional fees may apply. See Class Schedule. 2 to 4 undergraduate hours. 2 to 4 graduate hours. May be repeated. Prerequisite: Passing of a performance audition is required prior to the initial registration in any applied music course. Not intended for graduate music majors.
